ygData.subject: Re: Kobold vs Elder Tier'Dal
ygData.msgSnippet: When you click on the persona button, then on the skill button at the top left portion of your screen, scroll down to the language skills, Elder Tier Dal is
ygData.messageBody:
When you click on the persona button, then on the skill button at the top
left portion of your screen, scroll down to the language skills, Elder
Tier'Dal is not listed, but Kobold is. Now, if you go to change what
language you are speaking in, Kobold is not listed, but Elder Tier'Dal is.
It is a bug, to be sure, but that is why ppl are saying that they are the
same.

Talarin Kal'Amon, High Elven Wizard

----- Original Message -----
From: <kalekona@...>
To: <EQ_spell_research@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, May 25, 1999 4:21 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ_spell_research] Words but lack of Runes


> From: <kalekona@...>
>
> I don't know why people insist that Elder Tier'Dal is
> Kolbold when Tier'Dal is the Dark Elf Race.....Not to
> mention that there is a distinctly seperate language.
